sentences.sContent: Edward renounced his claim to the French throne.
sentences.sCn: 爱德华宣布放弃对法国王位的继承权。

synos.tran: 宣布放弃；与…断绝关系；垫牌

remMethod.val: re(重新) + nounc(讲话， 通告) + e → 重新宣布 → 声明放弃

trans.tranCn: 声明放弃； 拒绝， 否认
trans.tranOther: if you renounce an official position, title, right etc, you publicly say that you will not keep it any more
